basics.name: Francesco Dell'Orso
basics.label: Electronic Engineer
summary: I'm electronic engineer who can build product from ground up.
From my different jobs, I've gained experience to follow, manage and develop product.
From concept, through the various stages of the project, to arrive at industrialization.

work.name: Systel
summary: Systel was a third party electronic equipment productor. Hired as Avor technician,
I've to follow production to verify/improve process correctness. I could experience in SAP use,
and so improve data insertion. I became ICT programming responsable. Finally I worked side by side with Test
development chief to realize Test System for new incoming product.
highlights: CAM/CAE pcb analyze, SMD stencil production
Test System developping (ICT, Flying Probe, Functional test)

work.name: Nextys
summary: Nextys produce high efficiency Power Supply. My task was to follow developping of a brand new product: BattMaster.
BattMaster is an intelligent UPS monitor, supervises wirelessly the system and inform (status, lifespan, failure,...).
I've to conceive a Test System for whole BattMaster system and integrate new software release.

work.name: GFMS
summary: GFMS (ex AGIE-Charmilles) is leader on EDM Machine production. I started to work on production final test, after 3 month,
I became Die-Sinking failure research chief. Then I moved to R&D department, where I been in charge to develop new application technologies.
I supported (in-house & by the customer) application customer care department to achieve customer will.
highlights: Programming and use EDM (Wire and Die-Sinking) machine

work.name: Physei
summary: I was hired to bring my HW/SW skills for developping an economic 360 photo booth. The purpose of the project is
to bring this technology to everyone, that want to expose their commodity in a state-of-art manner.
In this work experience I've the pleasure to notevoly expand my technologic known/skills. Working with Linux as base system,
I add Xenomai for Real-Time purpose and develop real-time drivers. Remotely control is done via any type of device (Desktop, iOS, Android),
so I learned and implemented PWA web application to achieve the target.
highlights: PWA control GUI driven by NodeJs

education.studyType: Fundementals/Programming Oracle Java SE 8, Android Apps developing

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
